## About me

Daianna González is a Genomic Sciences undergraduate student at National Autonomous University of Mexico. She is broadly interested in pharmaceutics and pharmacogenomics.
Currently applying bioinformatics to understand the underlying gene regulation mechanisms of brain disease through omics data analysis in order to ultimately design effective therapies and drugs.
